attributes.action: We want you to add more police to the streets of Hartlepool
attributes.additional_details: We the citizens don't have the power to accomplish this and we believe the government can do this for us
attributes.background: We the citizens of Hartlepool feel there aren't police in Hartlepool to keep us safe so we want the government to add more

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the local police service.
